parameters.name: Area
parameters.description:
The ID of the billable region. Valid values:

*   **CN**: Chinese mainland
*   **OverSeas**: outside the Chinese mainland
*   **AP1**: Asia Pacific 1
*   **AP2**: Asia Pacific 2
*   **AP3**: Asia Pacific 3
*   **NA**: North America
*   **SA**: South America
*   **EU**: Europe
*   **MEAA**: Middle East and Africa
*   **all**: all regions

> 
If you do not specify this parameter, the default value CN is used. Alibaba Cloud supports the following countries and regions outside the Chinese mainland:
*   Asia Pacific 1: Hong Kong (China), Macao (China), Taiwan (China), Japan, and Southeast Asia excluding Vietnam and Indonesia.
*   Asia Pacific 2: India, Indonesia, Republic of Korea, and Vietnam
*   Asia Pacific 3: Australia and New Zealand North America: US and Canada
*   South America: Brazil
*   Europe: Russia, Ukraine, UK, France, Netherlands, Spain, Italy, Sweden, and Germany
*   Middle East and Africa: South Africa, Oman, UAE, and Kuwait

parameters.name: DataProtocol
parameters.description:
The protocol of the data to query. Valid values:

*   **http**: HTTP
*   **https**: HTTPS
*   **quic**: QUIC
*   **all**: HTTP, HTTPS, and QUIC. This is the default value.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The domain name.

*   You can specify multiple domain names and separate them with commas (,).
*   If you do not specify this parameter, the resource usage data of all domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

The end time must be later than the start time. The maximum time range that you can specify is **31** days.

parameters.name: Field
parameters.description:
The category of the resource usage data to query. Valid values:

*   **bps**: bandwidth
*   **traf**: traffic
*   **acc**: requests
*   **req_traf**: traffic for stream ingest
*   **req_bps**: bandwidth for stream ingest

> 
*   If you set this parameter to **acc**, the **Area** parameter is not supported.
*   The valid values of the **Type** parameter vary based on the value of the Field parameter. For more information, see the description of the **Type** parameter.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The time interval between the data entries to return. Unit: seconds. Valid values: **300** (5 minutes), **3600** (1 hour), and **86400** (1 day).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the resource usage data to query.

Valid values if you set the **Field** parameter to **acc**:

*   **static**: static requests
*   **dynamic**: dynamic requests
*   **quic**: QUIC requests
*   **all**: all requests

Valid values if you set the **Field** parameter to **bps** or **traf**:

*   **rts**: bandwidth or traffic for real-time streaming (RTS)
*   **all**: all bandwidth or traffic

Valid value if you set the **Field** parameter to **req_traf** or **req_bps**: **push**
